response.overview: Yoli De La Cruz, a 17 year-old high school student wants revenge after being sexually assaulted by Victor, the son of a dirty, corrupt police captain.  Realizing she will never get the justice she deserves, Yoli decides to train with Lobo, a former bare-knuckle fighter/hitman who recently left the mob to become a MMA trainer, after his life was saved by La Santa Muerte - a Mexican folk saint who personifies death.  After 6 months of intense, brutal training, Yoli is finally ready to go after Victor, but Lobo realizes Yoli has the potential to become the next underground MMA champion!
response.title: De La Cruz
